plugin.name: wsets
plugin._long: A plugin which allows manipulation of workspace sets.

option.name: wsets_bindings
option._short: Bind/Select workspace set to current output
option._long: A binding to bind and/or select the workspace set #N to the current output.

option.name: send_window_bindings
option._long: A binding to move the currently focused window to the workspace set #N.

option.name: label_duration
option._long: Sets the duration in milliseconds for which the workspace set label is shown.
